entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as a person who is questioning Harry about his use of magic. He is described as looking at Harry over the top of his parchment.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who has received an official warning from the Ministry for using illegal magic three years ago. He is described as conjuring a Patronus on the night of August 2nd.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as an organization that has given Harry an official warning for using illegal magic three years ago.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A Patronus is mentioned as a spell that Harry conjured on the night of August 2nd.
